name: The Runes of Zendos
overview: The Runes of Zendos is the sequel to The Oracle's Cave and shares gameplay elements with i's predecessor, a mixture of an action game and a text adventure. The mission is to save time itself, & the spirit of each month has been imprisoned by the evil wizard Zendos by hiding them in 12 different runic hour glasses. The player has to find the glasses and to release the spirits by deciphering complex runes associated with each.
